title: Simply Amazing
description: Simply Amazing is collection of uplifting stories of overcoming life's greatest obstacles. KC Armstrong begins the book with the heart-wrenching story of his tormented years after leaving the Howard Stern show and then his transformation to a life of hope and service to others. He weaves a theme of resilience and hope as he provides commentary on 11 favorite interviews from his WMAP radio station. Issues include Holocaust survival, mental illness, poverty, addiction, child advocacy and much more.Interviewees find their life callings through personal struggles. Great feel-good antidote for turbulent times and upbeat gift for any occasion
author: K.C. Armstrong
